function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contaminated steel push plates","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission through surface contact","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of push plates","Technologies":"Cold-spray process for fabricating copper coatings","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Incomplete inactivation of SARS-CoV-2 on copper-coated surfaces","Impact":"Potential for residual virus particles to remain active","Mitigation":"Periodic testing of coated surfaces for viral presence","Technologies":"Biological testing and analysis equipment","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Chemical composition of the copper coating","Impact":"Potential impact on human health and safety if the coating contains harmful substances","Mitigation":"Thorough assessment of the chemical composition of the copper coating","Technologies":"Chemical analysis and testing equipment","People":"Manufacturing personnel, researchers, and regulatory bodies","Owner":"Manufacturing and research organizations"}]}
